General.Name: Pulmuone Holdi
General.Description: Pulmuone Corporate produces, sells, and distributes fresh foods and beverages in South Korea and internationally. It provides functional foods, whole food, mineral water, and fermented milk products, as well as meal, concession, and catering services. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Eumseong-gun, South Korea.
